title: The Web as a distribution channel
description:
The Web as a new form of distribution channel has revolutionized the methods of transmitted the goods from the supplier to the final customer introducing a new age in the field of marketing. 

There are many advantages of using the Web asa distribution channel to the supply of the products and services. First of all, a Web distribution channel can approach many users and ship mass productsin different nations without having much expenditure. This entails a great expansion of the brand and an increasing number of customers who are aware of the companies’ facilities and its product’s benefits due to the brand promotion and advertising on the Web. In fact, Web allows people to have access to goods that cannot usually find in their own country, as most sites that sell goods ship them all over the world. Moreover, Web distributional channels reach new larger markets and contribute to the better collaboration between the companies leading to better prices and effective supply chain. Besides, it is commonly known that a company that is interested in expanding its operation in foreign markets needs significant consultation of the local distributors who are well-informed about the customer’s demand and preferences. Therefore, Web can be of their best assistant, as it eliminates the money waste and the time needed to approach such distributors so as to acquire important information. 

Another benefit is that it functions everyday 24 hours a day; therefore increasing the possibility of augmenting its sales given that there are lots of people that prefer to buy online due to the lack of their free time. Also, the fact that manufacturers can cut down on retail expenses, make products available at a lower price than the price of products that launched in a shop. A direct consequence of this is the increased demand, as each company can target in a larger customer base taking advantage of this pricing strategy.  

From companies’ perspective, Web facilitates the businesses to evaluate the resultsof internet marketing and measure the customer’s preferences by providing platforms that customers can give feedbacks or conduct research and measure traffic to the website. Hence, it becomes easier for a company to know more about the needs and habits of the consumers in a specific region and adjust its marketing strategies to them. Nevertheless, this knowledge and specialization are really precious to create a strong relationship between the company and the customers as it minimizes the consumers that feel left outfrom the distribution channel. As a matter of fact, companies do not need tocreate a new distribution channel but they can use the existed in which they invest a logic amount of money for that.

On the other hand, there are some particular disadvantages of using the Web as a distribution channel. One of the many disadvantages is that this distribution channel is usually very complicated and little flexible within its structure and for this reason, it creates delays within the distribution procedure. Due to the sophistication that it includes,it is very difficult for a company to supervise the selling environment and implement an alternative strategy if the customer’s habits change because they have not adequate and accurate personalized information. Also, it can pose potential channel conflict due to the multiple channels involved, something that needs a daily supervisor and activity so as to prevent misunderstanding, hacking about the product and the brand. At the same time, the Web needs many intermediaries who should be paid for these services leading to an increase in the product/service price which is burdened the final consumer. Moreover, they may have different strategic goals, a fact that may create conflicts during the distribution procedure causing loss of a harmonizer environment due to operational inefficiencies. This is because resellers are free to make changes to things injuring the image of the supplier.

title: Attracting talented candidates
description:
Having access to qualified candidates is essential for your successful attempt to recruit talented employees. However, creating a pool of qualified candidates is not an easy task. To achieve this goal, companies could use communication channels as frequent as possible.


However, the qualified word is important. A large reservoir of modest candidates does not have as much value as a small reservoir of qualified candidates. Using targeted, relevant communication channels to inform you about the available job can help you ensure that the percentage of qualified candidates in your tank is as high as possible.


Typical channelsi nclude staff recruitment offices, newspaper ads, colleagues' recommendations, departmental magazines, professional associations, networking, attraction through universities and the Internet. In addition, you can enhance the flow of qualified candidates through internal training programs and collaborations with colleges, universities and community organizations.


Personal recommendations from already employed employees are another useful method for expanding the pool of your candidates and many companies encourage this process by rewarding workers whose recommendations eventually led to recruitment. More generally, the practice is much less than others, and often leads to more satisfactory recruitment, since it is unlikely that already existing workers are proposing a candidate who does not meet the requirements or is likely to become a bad employee. 


A large enough pool of candidates ensures you a choice in the recruitment process. It also means that you will scrutinize more candidates to make the best choice. This meticulous examination begins with the careful review of CVs.


Selection and resume are the first presentations of the candidate to you. To get your attention, you must clarify the skills you are looking for. When you have to study a large number of CVs, implement a double-rating process to make your work easier. In the first evaluation, reject the CVs of candidates who do not meet the basic criteria for the position. 


In the second review, look for the CVs that they include:

·        achievements and results - for example, profit-oriented, stable or upward professional development.

·        a career pursuit that matches your job

·        excellent structure and appearance as a whole

In this evaluation also take into account the subtle differences between qualified candidates for years and experience, technical vs. managerial background, the quality of the companies you have worked in the past, etc. A general and useful tip is to apply a list of the strongest candidates to discriminate the CVs that they deserve from those that do not. 


When looking the curriculum vitae, be alert to signs that may indicate weak areas such as long description of education,  periods of inactivity, a short-term employment model, especially if the candidate belongs to the labor force for several years, a reasonable workflow, high personal information, and a description of jobs without describing the results or achievements.


After this procedure, you can continue with the interview stage so as to ensure that your choice best suits you! In any case, what matters in the end, is the positive results for your company!

title: Big Data and Data Analytics as a means of achieving companies’ competitive advantage
description:
The competition along with the customer expectations have increased a lot in the past years and therefore it is supported that businesses should find more innovative ways in order to increase their profits and remain enough competitive to maintaining their leadership or their brand positioning to themarket. 


One of the most useful ways to achieve this is by collecting, using and correctly interpreting the data that are available to the organization. In this attempt, the contribution of Big Data and Data Analytics can be an invaluable strategic resource for the organization. Exploiting data analytics tools, managers can make more accurate decisions as these decisions would be based on facts, quantitative research and not on suppositions. So, analytics is highly related to the decision-making process and constitutes not only a competitive advantage for the company but a strategic resource as well. Particularly, he expressed the notion that such competitive advantages can stem from the good use of business intelligence and predictive analytics. These tools are also well-implementable to every industry and every sector of the organization, such as marketing, operational department, quality management. 


However, to effectively use analytics, organizations should have Big Data and expertise people who can interpret them. Simultaneously, researchers have shown that companies used data analytics they should have the following characteristics: analytics supported a strategic, distinctive capability; the approach to and management of analytics was enterprise-wide; senior management was committed to the use of analytics, and the company made a significant strategic bet on analytics-based competition. Also, data analytics gives a competitive advantage to companies as data are cheaper to be collected comparing to previous years, there are useful tools that can interpret them without needing to invest a lot of money to infrastructures and there are people that can make this work and find the value that is hidden behind those data. 


For example, Internet of Things (IoT) assists companies to see their customers’ attitudes regarding certain products at a real-time base; hence giving companies the advantage to correspond quickly to customers’ behaviors. Apart from that, analytics can be used as an asset for companies since it provides a great chance for them to make extensive research concerning the market trends and the organizations’ operating activities, something that facilitates organization to see the sales trends, the improvements or the amendments needed to be done inside the organization, as well as the opportunities that emerge to the market. Also, organizations which exploit data analytics are able to innovate in the Market by making significant modifications in their processes or their products/services or by creating entirely new business models. This means that analytical practitioners are basically concentrated on operational improvements and strive to bring about data-driven innovations. Particularly, the most successful companies that used analytics exploit the artificial intelligence technology soas to increase the employees’ skills, save time from “big” projects and help managers to concentrate on the strategic details of the projects rather than involving managers to administrating processes demanded on such projects. Also, through this procedure, companies have the ability to detect and exploit new opportunities concerning their partnerships that can boost their business value chain. Along with this, companies that use data analytics, they increase their access to only useful data; hence saving time and money.


From the analysis above, it became more than apparent that data analytics contribute companies in miscellaneous ways, from resolving strategic issues to providing technological improvements such as cloud computing which ultimately concluded to acquire companies a sustainable competitive advantage.

title: The role of cultural awareness in organization success
description:
Establishing critical awareness of an organization’s culture is a difficult task that needs a coherent plan and persistence on the behalf of the manager and the leader of the organization. As it is stated above, one of the most popular ways to attain this is to be written all the values and the beliefs that the organization express by a mission statement and by establishing relevant rules. Without a doubt, transparency and clarity of the principles that incorporate an organization are very important so as to engage employees in its shared values and thus they should be expressed explicitly. 

Another way to promote this is by creating effective communication networks that will enable managers to communicate with the employees and identify the assumptions that they have about the organization’s philosophy and the way that the organization operates. In this way, a manager can recognize the misunderstandings or the points that mismatch with the values of the organization and hence to make a try to harmonize the differences arisen. Simultaneously, employees will feel that our opinion is respected by the organization and they will be more willing to embrace different options and keep pace with the organization’s philosophy. In any other case, conflicts may arise. 

As a matter of fact, through communication, employees can understand that diversity is a great benefit not only for the organization but for them also. Some authors also support that cultural awareness can be attained by applying holiday policies in which it will be recognized the diversity of the employees. This is one of the most effective ways to relax the employees, feel free and happy to acknowledge that the culture of the other person does not separate but brings together them. 

What’s more, training programs are also pivotal for imbuing cultural awareness, especially for the new–hired employees, because they give the opportunity to employees to show which are the philosophy of the organization and the ways that this philosophy could be evolved in the future with the contribution of them. 

Another effective measure that can be used is the “word tomouth” method that can be embellished by the stories disseminated across the organization concerning its cultural values. The paradigms and the success that knows the organization due to its cultural features reinforce the organization with a sense of proudness and urge them to follow the principles that characterize it. 

Cultural awareness is one of the most important parameters that bring about the success of anorganization. There are many reasons for that. First of all, cultural awareness instills a sense of loyalty and unity between the organization and the employees. This, in turn, stimulates employees to make the most of them so as to be more productive and effective in their jobs as they are eager to show that they deserve the respect that the organizations display to them. Besides, it becomes more than obvious that when employees work for an organization and believe to its cultural values, they make the best that they can so as to achieve its goals because the organization’s success equals to the employees’success. Therefore, employees become more creative and inspired. Also, cultural awareness can eliminate potential mistakes that they can be made by the employees as these principals function as a guide to their actions.

Also, cultural awareness is very important to organizations’ success because it contributes to the customers’  loyalty. More specifically, a great many customers distinguish an organization from another exactly because each organization has a unique identity that expresses some values that match with the values that they have. So, being the employees aware of the cultural principles of the organization is very important in order to retain its fame and prestige.

title: The purpose of using standard costs in the financial statements of companies
description:
Standard costing is utilized for determining the costs of direct materials, direct labor, and overheads needed to be produced product units in a specific fiscal year. This information is recorded in a report and presents the costs that a company expects if a particular (ideal or attainable) strategy is succeeded. 

Standard costs of materials (standard quantity and standard price), labor(standard hours and standard rate), and overheads (standard rate and standardquantity) are values that helps decisively the budget determination process and the variance analysis, as they function as a starting point of companies’ financial performance evaluation which in turn facilitates the manager to achieve better costs controlling and a restriction to variances; for this reason it is prepared before the other cost analysis procedures in relation to expected operation conditions. In particular, the material costs are defined by the contracts that the company signs to buy the raw materials in relation to the inflation, while the labor costs are set from the contracts between the employees and the company, as well as from the legal rules that require the minimum level of wages so as to secure the rights of the employees. Also,overheads are predestined from the data acquired by companies’ previous experience adjusted to the inflation or from expected costs due to the operational changes.  

The main purpose of standard costing systems is the arrangement of a company’s operating activities, as well as the efficacy of companies’ decisions regarding the number of costs and the company’s profits. To be more specific, standard costs are compared with the actual costs at the end of the fiscal year by applying a variance analysis. A successful managerial decision should be lead in a balance between the standard costs and the actual costs realizing the decision and the objectives that the company sets. Also, given that standard costs relates to the cost allocation, it can be used along with other costing methods, such as the job order costing system and the process costing system to appropriate allocate materials, work in process, and finished goods inventories with the view to simplifying costing procedures, encouraging cost reduction and fixing the company’s prices. 

Another purpose ofusing standard costs is to ensure better financial performance in the long runby motivating and calculating employee’s and managers’ efficiencies. In fact, the standard cost report “communicates” with employees by giving them guidelines that should be followed. To be more specific, employees are able to be informed about the consequences of the lack of job performance and production efficacy and the rewards that will be given in the case of high job performance. 

Simultaneously, it assists managers to apply the predetermined company’s strategy and facilitates the administration of human resources. Also, it is crucial for the production policy, as it contributes to being constructed a flexible budget, evaluates the dynamics of workforce and shows which are as are not productive. Finally, the standard costs prepare the managers and the employees to be ready for the actual production and informed about the strategy of the company enabling them to focus on a certain objective that should be achieved, hence facilitates their job and urges savings. However, the company should revise the standard costing reports at a regular base so as to see if changes emerged and thus alter the data given eventually achieving a better position for the challenges in the marketplace.

title: Information Technology and Globalization (Part I)
description:
Information technology plays a pivotal role not only in businesses but also in our everyday life. IT opens up the road ofglobalization in the early 20th century. The most important innovations were the Internet and Information System which contribute to the globalization. In early 1990, it appears the telegraph and the telephone and it is characterizedas a technological breakthrough since it facilitates the way in which people communicate. Another example is the airplane and generally, the improvements onthe transportation systems which bring people closer by eliminating the distances and the time take to travel. 

However, what has really revolutionized the communication, change the companies’ structure and bring globalization in our life takes place in the 21st century when IT technology emerges. In this period, there were some of the most catalyst breakthroughs, such as the invention of personal computers, the computer hardware, software, the telecommunications, the World Wide Web (Internet), the Work Flow Software which automate business processes giving efficacy to businesses, the open sourcing, the supplying chaining, and the digital technology movement. 

In essence, IT affects all economic sectors as it renovates the companies’ resources, creates new products/services and provides new opportunities on a global level. To be more specific,  IT helpscompanies to reap the benefits of globalization by opening up many new markets.This is achieved by eliminating trade hurdles which enable businesses to grow, establish common ethical standards and increase the information exchange. 

However, the most important role of Information technology in globalization is depicted in the telecommunication technology, as it facilitated the flow of knowledge and information by simultaneously reducing the cost prices. Globalization and the exploitation ofthe IT technology accelerate the time it takes to approach people, goods, and ideas on a global scale, hence increasing their communication. People have access to unlimited information resources and can share them with others; hence creating a global community. Along with this, IT influences the way in which people communicate. They used websites, blog, messages, e-mail, and Social networks. 

At the same time, e-mail cellular technology, instant text messaging, broadband communication enhance business collaboration to breakthrough innovations and the way in which companies communicate with each other. Simultaneously, the easy accessibility in the knowledge and information flow along with the capability of exchanging experience helps companies to increase their core competencies, employees’ skills and generally broaden the business horizons by being aware of the market trends and customers’ preferences at a global level, something that enabling them to establish strong strategies at an international level. 

Nevertheless, the globalization and the advancement ininformation systems have a direct impact on the international economy. That isto say that both of them bring about the interdependency of the global and local landscape, as what it happens in one country may influence the other. In addition to this, the advent of the Internet brings about many changes concerning the new markets and affects the global retailers as well as the customers’ purchasing habits. What’s more, it affects the way in which recruiters find employees and the way in which job seekers pursue a job. 

Nowadays, with the contribution of IT, people are able to find a job in another country by communicating with the employer via social networks. Respectively, recruiters can find the CV of job seekers in blogs or other platforms and choose the employee that best fit each position. The education sector also changes as online education becomes one of the most growing business fields. It offers convenience to students and it is no demand for their physical appearance.

title: Information Technology and Globalization (Part II)
description:
Globalization gives more opportunities for companies to grow and the Informational technology helps companies to reap such benefits. Therefore, Information Technology becomes one of the most powerful tools for firms that want to thrive and gain competitive advantages. With the advent of the Internet and the development of digital technology, multinational emerged. Due to the IT contribution, the distance is eliminated along with the location barriers. 


Also, it encourages global partnerships and global supply chains, something that empowers businesses to increase their effectiveness in planning, designing and exploiting the information well. This is because it gives transparency and creates a collaborative environment in which people can find an innovative solution to each problem As a matter of fact, Information technology opens-up also new markets in which the businesses’ entrance could realize in the most cost-effective way. Furthermore, small companies can enter into markets, approach distribution channels and innovate. What’smore, the expansion of information gives to companies a deep insight into other countries’ cultures. 


Due to the information received companies are able to detect and examine the differences between countries, analyze patterns of behaviors, and be able to adapt their strategy to new markets. Respectively, companies are able to see the advancements of other businesses that operate in other countries and hence to embrace or adopt some of the ideas or strategies that seemed to be successful. This improvement makes companies have some common characteristics but in the pace of time, they gave them the ability to also have competitive advantages as knowing how competitors behave and analyze their strategy, it has a significant effect to company’s profits. 


Also, IT benefits also the customers. The increase of businesses in the global market, the similarities in the products offered makes the competition even fiercer between them hence forcing them frequently to compete in prices. Therefore, companies offered cheaper products/services due to the increased competition and the so-called commoditization.


In essence, globalization makes technology to run in a very fast way and become one of the most powerful competitive advantages for businesses. Information technology has definitely transformed the global economy and has globalized the world. 


So, from the analysis above, it becomes more than apparent that many more companies pursue ways so as to constantly use the IT technology as an integral part of business function since they recognize the importance of reaping the advantages of globalization. 


Due to the many alternatives that customer has to the global companies, companies that fall behind to follow a global presence are condemned to fail since their customer base will be restricted and the customers’ bargaining power would be huge. Along with this, modern businesses should constantly re-evaluate their processes and their management so as tokeep pace with technology and continue to be developed. This is because IT is the driving force of globalization and is developing constantly. It is the meanin which companies can enter into the globalized world! 


So, companies are  imperative to exploit the IT technologies and adjust their business strategy in a globalized context. Only in this way, these companies are able to thrive

title: Digital Strategy and Approach for Small Businesses
description:
In the era of globalisation, digital strategy for small businesses has become an integral part to meet the business needs and objectives. To get started with the digital approach, you need to first define your goals. The goals that you set can be anything, whether you want your business to increase sales by 15% or aim for 50 social media shares. Once your goals are defined, prioritise them. These goals will be the guide to your digital strategy.



Next, focus on the audience that you are targeting and keep a check of their needs and the channels they use. For instance, if you are targeting young entrepreneurs, Snapchat or Instagram may belong to your digital plans. By keeping these key channels in mind, you can reach your target audience more efficiently.



Small business brands spend 25-43% on content marketing. Content is what the internet is built from, whether it’s emails, social media posts, blogs or visual contents. Therefore, content should be the driving force of your digital strategy in order for it to be effective. You will likely be using more than one marketing channels and loads of content to manage, so build out a calendar or timeline to stay consistent. Keeping everything in one place will help simplify the process as your workload increases.



Once the planning is done and everything that is required seems to be at the right place, it’s time to put your plan in motion. Make sure you have enough resources, money and time to properly execute the items planned in your digital strategy.



The last approach is to monitor and measure the results of your digital strategy. This will help you to analyse what was successful and what wasn’t. By receiving the information, it will help make your future digital efforts even stronger.

title: How to Send Large Files Using Google Drive
description:
In case you wish to share a large file using Google Drive, then the email will not compress it. In case you have a Gmail account, then you can easily send the large files by using Google Drive. Here’s how to send large files using Google drive.

How to Upload a File?

•    Sign in into Google Drive. Each Google account has a space of 15 gigabytes. In case you use Gmail, then enter the Gmail account details to sign in to the Google Drive account. Sign in by visiting www.drive.google.com.

  • In case you are using a smartphone, then you can use Google Drive application on your phone. The users can use this application for uploading the files from their Android or iPhone to Google Drive.

•    Press on the “New” option and after that, choose the “File Upload” option. It will open the file window permitting you to find the file in the device which you wish to start uploading on the Google Drive. You can move the file from their phone to the Google Drive screen to start uploading the file instantly.

  • Google Drive has the storage of 5 terabytes.

•    Let the uploading process of the file to gets complete on the device. In case you are uploading a large file on Google Drive, then it will take a few minutes to get completed its uploading process. You should check the internet connection of the device because it can interrupt you while uploading any file. You can check the upload procedure by going to the menu bar located in the end right-hand side of the Google Drive screen

  • In case you close the Google Drive screen, then the uploading process stops working. Make sure that the Google Drive screen should be open on the desktop till the file successfully get uploaded on the screen.

How to Send a File on Desktop?

•    Understanding sharing settings for Google Drive files and folders.

•    You need to right-click on the uploaded file and after that, choose the “Share” button.

•    Type the contacts by clicking on the “People” section for sharing the uploaded file to any particular Gmail user.

•    Press the “Get shareable link” option for creating an URL which you can share to any contact of Gmail account.

•    Now, start the downloading process of the uploaded file.

How to Send a File on Mobile?

•    Know the file sharing settings for Google Drive.

•    Enter the title of the uploaded file which you wish to send to any particular user.

•    Press on the “Add People” for sending the invitation to the user for downloading the file.

•    Press on the “Share link” button for sharing an URL to the uploaded file.

•    Change permissions by going in the “Show has access” column.

•    Start downloading the shared file.

title: How to Forward Your Yahoo Mail to Gmail
description:
Yahoo Mail can automatically and manually forward all your emails to any other account. If you want to forward Yahoo mails to Gmail account, then you can easily do so.  In this article, you will get to know the steps to forward your Yahoo Mail to Gmail.

 

 

Steps for Forwarding Your Yahoo Mail to Gmail

 

 

•    Sign in to the account associated with Yahoo Mail.

 

•    Choose the cog symbol for accessing the settings located in the upper right-hand side of the webpage.

 

•    Choose the Settings tab.

 

•    Press on the More Settings option.

 

•    Choose the Mailboxes option.

 

•    Choose the email ID linked with the Yahoo account.

 

•    Choose the Forwarding option.

 

•    Type the email ID registered with the Gmail located in the Forwarding Address column.

 

•    Choose the Verify option.

 

•    Sign in to the Gmail account.

 

•    Find the email by going to your Yahoo account.

 

•    Press on the link provided in the email to confirm the Gmail email ID with your Yahoo account.

 

 

Steps for Forwarding Your Gmail to Yahoo Mail

 

 

•    Sign in to the Gmail account.

•    Choose the gear symbol provided at the upper right-hand side of the inbox.

 

•    Choose the Settings, Forwarding, and POP/IMAP options.

 

•    Choose the “Add a Forwarding Address” option located at the upper side of the screen.

 

•    Type the email address linked with the Yahoo.

 

•    After that, choose the Next option.

 

•    Choose the Filters and Blocked Addresses options.

 

•    Choose the Create New Filter option.

 

•    Type the email address associated with Gmail provided in the From section at the upper side of the screen.

 

•    Type the email address of Yahoo in the “To” section.

 

•    Start adding filters below it.

 

•    Choose the Create Filter option.

 

•    Choose the Forward It To option located in the next menu.

 

•    After that, choose the Create Filter option.

 

 

Steps for Sending and Receiving Yahoo Mail from Your Gmail

 

 

•    Sign in to the Gmail account.

 

•    Click on the cog symbol given at the upper right-hand side of the Gmail inbox.

 

•    Choose the Settings, Account, and Import options.

 

•    Choose the “Check Mail from Other Accounts option.

 

•    Choose the “Add a POP3 Mail Account You Own” option.

 

•    Enter the email ID registered with Yahoo account.

 

•    Choose the Next Step option.

 

•    Type the Yahoo email ID and password linked with your Yahoo account.

 

•    Type the POP3 server given in the next menu.

 

•    Go through all the sections expect the Archive section.

 

•    Choose the Add Account option.

 

•    Go through the “Yes to I Want To Be Able to Use Email As” option.

 

•    Type the name.

 

•    Choose the Next Step.

 

•    Type the Yahoo SMTP server information given in the next menu.

 

•    Choose the Add Account option.

 

•    Go through the email you have received from Yahoo.

 

•    Type the verification code from the Yahoo Mail.

 

•    Click on the Verify option.

 

Source url:- http://ww-norton.com/how-to-forward-your-yahoo-mail-to-gmail/

title: How to Make the Background Black & White in Snapseed
description:
Snapseed is the most famous photo editor application for both the iPhone and Android users. It is a free application and performs better than the other photo editor apps.  If you want to make the background black & white in Snapseed, then go through the steps mentioned below.

 

 

Steps to Make the Background Black &White in Snapseed

 

 

The procedure we would apply in this article is Selective Coloring. You can use many tools with Snapseed to get a powerful effect. Choose the photo which you want to edit and start saving the image copy in the selected folder. Here are the steps mentioned below to make the background black & white in Snapseed:

 

•    Go to the photo which you wish to edit in the Snapseed.

 

•    Choose the Tools, Black, and White options.

 

•    Choose the Neutral option.

 

•    It will change all the photos into monochrome.

 

•    Choose the checkmark to agree.

 

•    Choose the Layers symbol located at the upper side of the display.

 

•    Select the View Edits option provided at the end of the display.

 

•    Click on the Black and White option.

 

•    Choose the brush symbol given in the middle of the slider window, which is showing on the screen

 

•    Choose the Invert Tool given near the X button.

 

•    Decrease the Black & White option into 0.

 

•    Choose the Mask symbol.

 

•    It will change the photo into a red color.

 

•    Start using the finger to move outside the photo to return to the original color.

 

•    Choose the Checkmark option.

 

•    Choose the Save as option for storing the image copy in the selected folder.

 

 

Additional Way to Make the Background Black & White in Snapseed

 

 

Follow the additional method listed below for this procedure. Snapseed is a platform where you can track a subject, but you have to use the Black and White option for this procedure.

 

•    Go to the photo which you wish to edit in the Snapseed.

 

•    Choose the Tools, Black, and White options.

 

•    Click on the Neutral option.

 

•    Click on the checkmark option.

 

•    Choose the Layer Settings symbol located at the upper side of the display.

 

•    Select the View Edits option located in a new window.

 

•    Choose the Black and White option by going to the edit window.

 

•    You will get the brush symbol in the middle of the display.

 

•    Increase the Black and White option to 100 in the middle of the panel.

 

•    Choose the Invert Tool located at the end of the display.

 

•    After that, choose the checkmark option.

title: Five Ways To Keep Your Home Water Damage Free
description:
(Water damage may seem harmless enough, however…it can be incredibly destructive to you and your home). Cedar Rapids, a wondrous place to be taken control by the waters beneath you. A place where you can get an adrenaline rush and enjoy something fantastic in order to make incredible memories.  And yet, while you take on the rapids, there are safety measures that need to be taken. You need to sit carefully in your raft with a life vest strapped about your upper body. For rapids, beautiful as they are, can be very dangerous. The same can be said of the powers of property water damage. Water may seem harmless enough but left to its own devices it can be incredibly destructive to your home. Water damage can happen to anyone and at any time. But before it happens to you, take some simple measures to decrease the risk of sudden loss due to water damage Cedar Rapids.

 Update Any Drainage Pipes That Your Home Has:  Make sure that your drainage pipes are up to date. When constructing or updating them, place the drainage pipes in such a manner that rain water falls through and ejects away from the home. Under no circumstances should you allow the drain pipes to release water close to the foundation. If so, you then run the risk of water weakening your foundation over time which can prove dangerous if left alone.

Install A Sump Pump:  Are you having water issues mostly in the basement? Do they happen often? Then a Sump Pump will be of assistance to you. Choose a cast iron pump, and in case of a power outage, get a battery powered device as back up.

Keep Your Doors And Windows Up To Date: When it is time to purchase new windows, make sure that you pick out windows which are water tight and thick of glass. If you wish to save money by not purchasing new windows, inspect the old ones; make sure that if any seams or cracks are visible, they be sealed and cleaned in order to restore their previous sheen.

Replace Your Pipes:  Pipes for homes have a similar lifespan to humans when it comes to years:  50-80 years. It is highly recommended that your pipes be replaced every fifty years. But, are you unsure of your pipes lifespan? Fear not! For a plumber will be able to access your pipes and inform you of their current age.

Every Year Give Your Roof A Thorough Investigation:  Roofs are great objects which under most circumstances, provide an effective defense against the rain and snows of the heavens, who are responsible for many water damage instances. Regularly, at least once a year, check on the state of your roof. Are you missing shingles on your roof? Or does your roof possess damaged shingles? Then they would need to be replaced in order to keep your home up to date and safe from outside forces. 

At Challis Restoration, our restoration professionals deal with water damage cleanup in the Cedar Rapids area day in and day out and most of these incidents are preventable.

if it so happens that your home experiences water damage. With hundreds of water damage repair projects under their belt, in addition to highly trained and nationally certified staff, they have the know-how and experience to get you cleaned up, dried out and back to living FAST! Plus – they  stand behind their work with a 100% Unconditional Guarantee.

title: When to Call a Professional Tree Service
description:
Here are the times when it’s wise to call a pro:

When the break is high
Cracked or broken branches high in the limbs of a tree can pose a danger to people and property below.  But, more than that, it’s hazardous to climb a tree and wield the tools necessary to cut the offending limb. In the process of pruning, the branch or even the property owner could fall from the tree.  

When the branch is heavy
A large or heavy branch is another danger due to the potential for property damage caused by the limb falling. There is also the potential for injury to the person pruning, either by the limb or the tools required to prune a big branch.  For this reason, tree trimmers require extensive training and are required to wear safety gear while working.

This also applies when the tree is close to a structure, power lines, or another risk or obstacle, a tree service can minimize the danger without putting the worker at risk.

When the property owner lacks expertise
When a property owner lacks the knowledge in proper pruning techniques, even one who has appropriate skills with a chainsaw and owns the protective gear shouldn’t prune a tree. Inexpert tree pruning can also damage a healthy tree and create more problems.  Some of these include allowing entry of insects and pathogens or creating a permanent ugly flaw instead of a cut which will heal nicely.

Light limb removal at the lowest branches of a tree is a skill which can be learned and practiced if the property owner has the right tools and protective gear. But, when branches are bigger, in hazardous locations, or require more skill than the property owner possesses, a good tree trimming company can do the job safely and skillfully, thereby preventing more damage to the tree and maintaining a safe environment for all.

title: JetSetFly - Dropshipping is for Whom?
description:
Dropshipping is really a pretty great industry model for the first-timer entrepreneurs who are just dipping their feet into the world of online business. It is attractive to the novice as it is a low-investment and a low-risk way of beginning your own business, therefore, does not feel like that much of a stake.

 

Since the quantity of the capital that needed to be invested in this business venture is just minimum; and it is also the best for someone that is already an owner of the online store with the inventory, but seemed to try out precise goods in the marketplace to see just how well it performs before you stock-up on it. If you are interested in discovering and learning more regarding this matter, there are some posts that you can check out about the best product ideas with the dropshipping tips.

 

For those that are expecting amazing margins just write off their bat, this kind of business model can be very disappointing. If the profit is your main interest then you had to be better off in going straight to this source—like the manufacturers—but these manufacturers don’t always assist in the dropshipping. Since the dropshipping profit margins have been considerably lower in the comparison to some other business models like manufacturing and wholesaling, this dropshipping would probably not bode really well with the brand that is already a new beginning, since the business does not have the definite control when it deals with the customer satisfaction by branding and brand experiences.

 

 

Types of entrepreneurs which the dropshipping model will surely work well:

 

Budget Entrepreneur - dropshipping is absolutely the least costly method of vending products online, since you do not have to buy any inventory upfront. In this regard, the dropshipping system works really well for the entrepreneurs that have the limited budget or might prefer to keep the startup amount as depleted as possible.

 

First Time Entrepreneur v - this dropshipping form for online selling is also a good industry model for somebody that is just starting out their online selling. The fact is that selling online is not that simple. Driving traffic and switching that traffic for an average marketer will take a longer time to figure out and optimizing. Because of the lower costs connected with starting the dropshipping industry, it permits the new entrepreneurs to begin learning the chains of putting up the online store, driving the traffic and the conversion optimization just before investing thousands (and even more) in the inventory that you will get stuck with.

 

Validating Entrepreneur - dropshipping may be the best means in testing the recent products, or even the new startup, just before heavily investing into the inventory that will not sell, making it the ideal business model for those entrepreneurs that required the highest level of industry and product validation just before the investment.

 

Walmart Entrepreneur - dropshipping is for the person who wanted to sell a huge diversity of models and products. Depending on the price range of the products that you intend to vend, or if you wanted to sell thousands of different goods, it is nearly impossible without the massive funding to obtain all of that inventories. In this manner, dropshipping will be the proper model, since you do not need to buy inventory upfront.

title: Jetsetfly Getting Started with the Dropshipping Business
description:
All of this seems like a difficult puzzle, but the moment you learn about how to dropship, it becomes a smooth procedure for everyone engaged in. You, being the dropshipping trade, can do all things remotely and will never even feel the solo product!

 

Please remember that you do not need any business encounter just to open your dropshipping storefront. It will certainly help, but, it is not necessary. Lots of budding entrepreneurs do not ever chase their thoughts since they believe they needed their MBA or some years of worth of experience. It is usually not the situation. One of the many advantages of dropshipping is, you can be taught or discover how to dropship or how does dropshipping works as you go on.

 

Better yet, there had been so many resources that will make dropshipping easier and simpler than ever before. One example is a very useful video will give some great advices while you are getting started. You may absolutely have zero business experience, but will still easily make your profit. You will need to discover the ropes as you go along the way, plus it will be demanding at times, but it is believed to be more than important.

 

As it has been mentioned earlier, you do not need many kinds of resources to begin with what you are planning on a dropshipping business. Now that you already understand what is dropshipping, you also need to read more to discover what you needed to get started!

 

 

Terminologies of dropshipping:

 

Search Engine Marketing or SEM – this is an online marketing aimed to increase the given website’s evidently on the search engine result page or SERP by mutually optimizing the site for purchasing ads, paid inclusions and indexing.

 

Search Engine Optimization or SEO – this is the process of creating the website easier to categorize and index by the search engine bots.

 

Search Engine Result Pages or SERP – the search engine web pages that displayed the list of the responses to the certain search query.

 

 

 

 

Shipping – this is the process of moving merchandise physically from the point of origin, such as the retailer’s warehouse to the destination, like the home of the customers.

 

Social Media – this is the internet based tool or the websites that facilitates sharing of opinions, links, images, contents, or videos in between individuals.

 

Social Media Marketing – this is the branch of internet advertising aimed at promoting services and products through the social media. It can be thought as the web based word from the mouth marketing.

 

Sole Proprietorship – this is the business structure where an individual both owned and runs the business. In most part, there has been no legal distinction in between the business and the owner.

 

Split Testing – in the online marketing, the testing model that has marketers simultaneously tested two variables that is usually labeled as A and B so that they can locate which variation in the web page, designs or ad content are the best possible results.

title: 3 Ways To Prepare For Business Fires
description:
A fire at your place of business in Las Vegas affects everyone in your building and is one of the worst disasters that can happen to a business owner. Commercial fire damage in Las Vegas is devastating and must be planned for and prepared for by every business owner. As a business owner, you need to focus on fire risk assessment, fire prevention, and staff education so you can help reduce the risk of a fire occurring and help to mitigate the damage if it does.

Fire Risk Assessment

Fire safety codes must be in place for businesses. You should contact your local fire marshal and schedule a visit for your business so they can help you make sure safety codes are met, and an effective fire prevention plan is in place. Property managers should have a fire escape route clearly defined for the building, so be sure that it is posted in your work area. You can also use the National Fire Protection Association’s website for further information and publications on the fire safety code for businesses. Keeping your place of business in line with fire safety codes will greatly reduce the risk of fires.

Fire Prevention And Protection

Standard fire safety practices call for smoke detectors and fire extinguishers on every floor of the building. Automatic sprinkler systems are also a great tool to provide primary protection for your business in case of a fire. Emergency equipment kits should also be available in your workplace to provide items such as bottled water, flashlights, and escape masks to fight against smoke inhalation.

Fire Safety Education For Staff And Employees

Educating employees and staff on how to respond in the wake of fire will greatly increase the odds of everyone getting out of the building safely and quickly. Here are some ways you should educate employees about fire safety:

Have a fire escape plan in place, and make sure your employees are informed and rehearsed on how it works. Post the fire escape routes in areas that can be seen by all building occupants. Conduct a fire drill at least once a year to keep employees practiced and aware of the fire escape plan.

Designate an office fire safety and prevention officer. Their duties will include composing escape routes that are in compliance with the building manager, designate safe meeting points outside of the building, and offer scheduled fire safety training and education for fellow employees. They will also be sure that fire prevention information and practices are up to date and in compliance with business safety codes.

Install an automatic sprinkler system in your building. Sprinkler systems are cost-effective and have proven to be the best way to fight the spread of a commercial fire. The National Fire Protection Association reported that properly installed and maintained sprinkler systems are 95% effective in commercial fires.

 Make sure all employees know how to activate the emergency response system in your building. Most commercial fire alarms alert local authorities and fire departments when they go off, but it is still good practice to be sure that all employees know how to alert emergency personnel.

If you find your commercial property damaged by fire or smoke, you can contact the professional fire damage restoration team at Design Builders in Las Vegas 24 hours a day! we also provides professional services for commercial construction in Las Vegas.

title: Rising fuel costs: Who profits by charges on petroleum, diesel?
description:
Expenses on fuel costs 

The Modi government has raised the extract obligation on oil and diesel nine times previously its single decrease of Rs 2 for each liter a year ago.

Duties on oil and diesel are an imperative income hotspot for both the Center and state governments. The Center forces extract obligation, traditions obligation, and a cess on oil and diesel. For states, deals duty or Value Added Tax (VAT) is the primary wellspring of acquiring from petroleum and diesel. 

As of now, the extract obligation on petroleum is Rs 19.48 for each liter and Rs 15.33 on per liter of diesel. The Modi government has raised the extract obligation on oil and diesel nine times previously its single decrease of Rs 2 for each liter a year ago.

                                                                         

The Center has collected over Rs 4.6 lakh crore from extract obligation on oil-based goods - Rs 2.42 lakh crore in 2016-17 and Rs 2.29 lakh crore in 2017-18 - in the last two monetary years. 

Unrefined petroleum doesn't draw in any traditions obligation, however, there is a 2.5 for every penny traditions obligation on oil and diesel. At that point, there is the 20 for every penny oil industry advancement cess on rough oil and a National Calamity Contingent Duty (NCCD) of Rs 50 for every metric ton. As unrefined petroleum remains the greatest import for India, these charges contribute vigorously to income age.

For instance, the retail cost of oil in Delhi was Rs 82.06 for every liter yesterday (September 17). Around Rs 38 of it involves charges towards the Center and the state government - similarly separated between the two. In addition, the state government gets 42 for every penny of the extract income earned by the Center as per the Finance Commission grant.

Income for states through VAT on oil-based goods expanded from Rs 1.66 lakh crore in 2016-17 to Rs 1.84 lakh crore in 2017-18. Maharashtra forces the most elevated VAT on oil of 39 for each penny. It earned Rs 25,611 crore from the VAT on oil-based commodities in 2017-18 - the most noteworthy in the nation. Maharashtra's petrol-income is trailed by Uttar Pradesh's at Rs 17,420 crore and Tamil Nadu's at Rs 15,507 crore.

Just four states including the survey bound Rajasthan and Andhra Pradesh have cut VAT on oil and diesel to cut down their costs. Rajasthan started the pattern with a four for every penny VAT cut on oil and diesel bringing about a decrease of Rs 2.5 in oil costs. 

The move was trailed by Andhra Pradesh, which cut expenses by Rs 2 and West Bengal, which diminished duty by Re 1. The Karnataka government, as well, reported a VAT cut by Rs 2 on oil and diesel yesterday.

title: MEMS (micro-electromechanical systems
description:
A MEMS (micro-electromechanical systems)is a smaller than expected machine that has both mechanical and electronic segments. The physical measurement of a MEMS can extend from a few millimeters to short of what one micrometer, a measurement commonly littler than the width of a human hair.

The IoT is up and coming – as are the security moves it will definitely bring. Get up to speed on IoT security fundamentals and figure out how to devise your very own IoT security methodology in our new e-manage.

                                                     

The name MEMS is being utilized to portray both a class of micromechatronic gadgets and the procedures utilized when producing them. A few MEMS don't have mechanical parts, yet they are named MEMS since they scale down structures utilized in traditional apparatus, for example, springs, channels, cavities, gaps, and layers. Since a few MEMS gadgets convert a deliberate mechanical flag into an electrical or optical flag, they may likewise be alluded to as transducers. In Japan, MEMS are all the more usually known as micromachines, and in European nations, MEMS are all the more generally alluded to as microsystems innovation (MST). In the United States, the acronym "MEMS" rhymes with "stems." 

Not at all like traditional mechatronic gadgets, MEMS are regularly made with a similar group manufacture procedures used to make incorporated circuits (ICs) and numerous business MEMS items are coordinated and bundled together with ICs. MEMS manufacture permits miniaturized scale sensors, which assemble information, and small-scale actuators, which convert vitality into movement, to coordinate on a similar substrate.

                                                       

The MEMS underneath is really a dispensable, wearable insulin pump for overseeing diabetes, outlined by Debiotech and STMicroelectronics. As per Debiotech, the chip is a pile of 3 layers reinforced together: a silicon on separator (SOI) plate with micromachined pump structures and two silicon cover plates with through-openings. A piezoelectric actuator on the chip moves the layer in a responding development to pack and decompress liquid in the pumping chamber.

In spite of the fact that MEMS have a low for each gadget generation cost, bundling can be a test. Every mem must be bundled so electrical or optical hardware and other gadget parts stay free from air and water defilement, while as yet have the capacity to interface with the encompassing condition and accommodate movement.

                                                 

MEMS was a developing innovation a couple of years back, yet today the vast majority communicate with MEMS once a day. Each new car that moves off a mechanical production system has somewhere around 50 MEMS; they are vital parts in different commanded security frameworks, including air packs, electronic strength control (ESC) and tire pressure monitoring systems (TPMS).

The little framework on a chip (SOC) that naturally modifies screen introduction on an advanced mobile phone is another case of a MEMS numerous individuals cooperate with every day. As MEMS end up littler, require less power and are more affordable to produce, they are relied upon to have a critical impact on the remote internet of things (IoT) and home computerization.

Other business utilization of MEMS include: 

  • Sensor-driven warming and cooling frameworks for building administration frameworks.
  • The smaller scale reflects clusters for superior quality projection frameworks.
  • Brilliant residue for the location of ecological changes in atomic manufacturing (nanotechnology) clean rooms.
  • Micronozzles to control the stream of ink in inkjet printers.
  • Minor gyrators, indicators, accelerometers and receivers to help versatile applications.
  • Expendable weight sensors for use in human services.
  • Optical exchanging gadgets that enable one optical flag to control another optical flag

title: Haven’t  you invested in digital marketing yet? Think again.
description:
How many times have you heard about large companies’ bankruptcy? Blockbuster, HMV,Clinton’s, Borders, Kodak is only some examples of companies that lag behind from innovative technology and went bankrupt. Digital marketing is evolving, and companies that do not keep pace with it are condemned to fail. With the advent of the Internet, customers have unlimited access to information and can compare products/services. Respectively, more and more people spend much time on the Internet or using its mobile phones to make purchases. As a result, what it works in the past for a business will not working the future as the market is becoming even more competitive. The history reaffirms this notion. It is the norm. 

If it be so, what are you waiting for? The Digital age is here and it comes tostay. With this article, I am going to change your point of view on Digital Marketing. It’s time to capture the attention of your customers.

Let’s see the eight core advantages that you cancapitalize...

1.   Make online purchases an attitude for customers and experiencesignificant profits: Thisis a long-term advantage for your company. Customers should be able to understand the benefits offered by your company. So, what you should do is to exhibit explicitly the advantages provided by adopting a “can-do” attitude.  In nutshell, give good reasons to your customers to trust you and adore online sales. 

2.   Lower barriers to getting entry into the market: This advantage is precious for small companies that have not yet built their reputation in the market and cannot afford the increased competition due to thelack of “big budgets” and capital. So, the only thing that you have to do is tolearn about the international regulations and start your own business having a strong IT team. If you are a start-up company, do not miss the chance to become the “new disruptive innovator” of the market.   

3.   Become an international company

E-commerce sites do not have a physical location but instead, they operate as an online platform. Therefore, your target customers can stem from people all over the world. So, Digital Marketing helps you to get into various market segments,increase your customer basis and claim a huge brand positioning in the market. 

4.   Cost-effectiveness: From afinancial perspective, becoming digital is the best way to save resources and money. No “big” capital is needed but only a strategic plan and devotion toyour goal. 

5.   Achieve agility and flexibility: Being online means that you have the flexibility to make amendments or additions toyour site accordingly to the customers’ demands only by making some “clicks”. 

6.   Not interruptive: Advertising on Television is frustrating for many viewers. Adversely, online ads appear to viewers according to their preferences. This feature makes ads less interruptive and increase the potential to attract the attention of viewers. 

7.   Don’t forget the social media impact. Gain in publicity andcustomers’ trust and engagement: Design an impeccable content, create interesting articles, provide information about the company and share them in social media. Reaping the advantages of social media is a “must” in our modern world for those that target in achieving brand loyalty and higher exposure. Also, don’t disregard that having many followersand taking many “likes” lead people to believe that your content is worthy. In essence, all you have to do is to build a strong presence in social media andthe word-to-mouth marketing method will benefit you. 

8.   Exploit IT technology to learn from your competitors and be aleader. Measure the effectiveness of your marketing plan, collect data and getreal-time results:  Hiring expertise employees and establishing strong software programs can help you to know each strategic movement of your competitors and consequently to have a direct response and take proactive measures, so that beat the competition. Try to use GoogleAnalytics and enjoy better ROI rates. 

Are you still doubt?

title: Josh King Madrid Revealed his life being changed
description:
A lot of people will surely not read or look at this whole story. This story of mine is never shared to anyone, until one day, I decided to share my story to speak about e-commerce seminars and meet-ups in Miami.

When I was still going to school, I would like to prove to everyone that doubted me that they are all wrong about my dreams and ambitious goals. I know lots of people that considered what I was achieving with entrepreneurship are really a big JOKE.

To be specific, I had this buddy who for various reasons assists me with everything that I do in the field of academics, tracks, basketball, and a lot more.

But, when it is about starting my personal business and creating a brand, he was the one that had the most negative comments and doubts towards what I planned to do.

I even ended up making a bet and saying to him that I could achieve all these MASSIVE goals of mine, and I said that I would, when he said that I wouldn’t, and we even filmed it and even said that after 3 months we would look back at it together to see who was the right one, and I ended up attaining all of them!

I totally forgot about these not until one day after months had passed, I was scrolling the videos on my cell phone and saw it and I decided to send it to him, but there was no reply.

After another more 3–4 months since I have ever spoken to him and I take a random message like “Hey Josh, I am super pleased by what you had been doing, and I am so sorry for always speaking sh*t back in that day, just keep it up, man!”

I consider replying since I initially felt hostile due to the negative energy I welcomed months prior that, which I thought take me to grind. Recognizing my buddy for some years now, I also know that just like me that he adores to be right. And so I applauded him tremendously for making contact with me. It really takes a REAL good man for him in making that. And so after that 12 hours of reflecting, I finally responded to his message and let him identified how much I am grateful for him coming ahead and congratulating me after that 8+ month of my chores paying off.

Then after another 12 hours that passed, about 24 hours after his first message, I received a phone call from one of our old high school coach, telling me that “Josh, it is “your buddy” man, and he is dead… He got in a car accident and hit his head last night”.

My heart freeze-up and I felt awful however, I immediately looked at the positive circumstances that had to arrive from this negative vibe. Abruptly, “Proving people incorrectly, or making it for your haters” did not feel really good at all.

That emotion of proving people that they are wrong, which I thought take me to my accomplishment was really a bad feeling. Although we had that disconnection, but, that was my buddy and I can give up that “cause” 10 out in 10 times just to have him now and be back again. I will miss him, but I know that he is in a much better place now.

But, this instance has now changed my PURPOSE and my MISSION.

I realized that I do not put out content, value, and act as firm as I can prove the people WRONG instead to prove the people RIGHT.

To discontinue the people who would have given up with themselves due to outside judgments or what the teachers, friends and parents, would say to disprove them, I will do what I need to do, so I may be able to inspire and educate those people in becoming the best that they may be for THEMSELVES and nobody else.

I really do this for the people that cannot and for the people that have permanently adrift their opportunity. Also for the people that need a little more belief within them. It is not about making it to prove someone WRONG. It is about making it to PROVE to them that YOU are RIGHT.

This is now one of the major reasons why I do what I am doing now. So I am setting out on a mission to transform the game forever:

Remember that what the others did in their life and in their career, then Team Jet Set is also doing it to Internet Marketing and E-commerce.

title: BEFORE YOU START A BUSINESS.
description:
Starting a business is like a dream that many people among us has. But unfortunately only few among us do really become business owners and will never leave the comfort zone of being an employee. But if you are sure about quitting your job and turning your business idea into reality, here are the things to consider before you start your business, because starting a business isn't great as it sounds.

Business is not simple

Business is not what you see in movies, it's not fun at all. If you do not develop your social skills and how to be patient, you will be out of your business in no time. Of course there are some great moments happens in business but they happens rarely. 

Not always new

There is a common misconception that if you want to start a business, you have to come with something new and unique. Which is not completely true. Best way to start a business especially when you are a beginner is to take an existing business idea that seems to be working great, add it to your own idea, modify and just do it.

Start with minimum expenses

Most small business do not need lot of money to start a business, especially if it is an online business , whats requires in the beginning of the business is the handwork to get it to the point where it starts generating income.

Only results matter

As an employee the more hours you work the more you must be paid. But this logic cannot be applied in the business. In business your clients don't really care how hard you work, what matters at the end is your results. So you need to have patient before you come to a conclusion.

title: FINANCIAL STRATEGY
description:
The financial strategies of any business organization are related to several areas of financial management and business strategies. 

Any financial strategy includes: 

• Acquiring required capital/ sources of funds

• Developing projected budgets

• Utilization of funds

• Evaluating Business worth 


Acquiring required capital ( sources of funds): Successful strategy implementation often requires additional capital. Theoretically any business enterprise must have enough debt in its capital structure to boost its return on investment. Strategies related to the sources of funds are important since it determine how financial resources will be made available for implementation of business strategies.

Developing financial budgets/ statements: Projected financial statements is a central strategy implementation technique as it allows an organization to examine the expected results of various actions and approaches. There are several types of financial budgets used by different business enterprise. Some of this includes cash budgets, operating budgets, sales, capital, expenses and fixed budgets. If an organization experiences financial difficulties, budgets will be helpful in guiding strategies for business to minimize further losses. But organisation must know that can a budget is atool and not an end in itself.

Utilization of funds: The management of funds can play a pivotal role in business strategies as it aims at the conservation and optimum utilization of funds .Financial plans and policies, however, present a dilemma before management. The priorities of management may often conflict with those of shareholders. It is the responsibility of the strategist to minimize the conflict of interest between the management and the shareholders.

Evaluating Business worth: There are various approaches for determining a business's worth can be grouped into there main approaches.

- The first approach in evaluating the worth of a business is determining it's net worth or stockholders' equity. Net worth represents the sum of common stock additional paid-in capital and retrained earnings. After calculating the net worth, add or subtract an appropriate amount for goodwill and overvalued or undervalued assets. This total provides a reasonable estimate of a firms monetary value.

- The second approach says that the worth of business should be based largely on the future benefits its owner may derive through net profits. A thumb rule is to establish a business's worth as five times the firm's current annual profit. A five-year average profit level could also be used. 

-  The third approach, letting the market determine a business's worth, involves three methods. 

      First, base the firm's worth on selling price of a similar company. However, comparing figures are not easy to locate.

      Second is price- earnings ratio method. In this method divide the market price of the firm's common stock by the annual EPS ( Earning Per Share ) and multiply this number by the firm's average net income for the past five years.

     The third method, simply multiply the number of shares outstanding by the market price per share and add a premium. The premium is simply a per-share amount that a person or firm is willing to pay to acquire the other company. This can be called the outstanding shares method.

title: BUSINESS LEVEL STRATEGY FOR CUSTOMER'S SATISFACTION.
description:
An organization's core competencies should be focused on satisfying customer needs or wants in order to achieve organization objectives. This is done through business level strategies. 

What are Business Level Strategies?

Business level strategies are the courses of action adopted by an organization for each of its business separately, to serve identified customer groups and  this provides value to the customers by satisfying their needs. An organization gains a competitive advantage by exploiting core competencies in specific, individual product or service markets. In simple words Business Level Strategy is concerned with a firm's position in an industry, relative to the customers and the competitors.

Who are the customers?

Customers are the foundation of an organization's business level strategy. Knowing one's customers is very important in obtaining and sustaining a competitive advantage. Being able to successfully predict and satisfying customer needs in present and future is very important for any business enterprise. Perhaps one of the Tata's mistake in manufacturing Nano was understanding who was their real customers and what they wanted. So who will be served, what needs have to be met, and how those needs will be satisfied are to be determined particularly by the senior management.

How to satisfy customers needs?

Any business enterprise or an organization must determine how to bundle up the resources and capabilities to form core competencies and then use these core competencies to satisfy customer needs or create value for them. Business level strategy provides many advantages for a business enterprise in service market as well as every individual customer. Having selected a market, the organization must develop a plan to be successful in that market. Business strategy therefore looks at how the organization can compete successfully in the individual market that it chooses to operate within.

How strategy is concerned with customer satisfaction?  

To meet the customer needs in any area of business over the competitors or in the market strategy provides the required help in meeting customers needs and provides advantage over other competitors. An organization using a successful strategy may concentrate on a particular group of customers and geographic markets better than competitors who serve a broader market.

In short Business Level Strategy is concerned with issues such as: 

• Meeting the needs of key customers.

• Achieving advantage over the competitors.

• Avoiding competitive disadvantage.

             " Get closer than ever to your customers. So close, in fact, that you tell them what they need before they realize it themselves."

    - Steve Jobs, Apple.

title: Does Money motivate you?
description:
We all know that we are offered monetary incentives in our workplace, be it any industry or any sector. But is it the only reason we work? Does money matter? Most of us would argue and ask “what else do we work for” or reply “we work for our own satisfaction and love for our career”. Say what?! Both are not true. Money does drive us and keeps us going towards our professional and personal goals. But money is not the only thing we work for. While money is essential for our survival, basic necessities as well as luxuries, we continue working a particular job in a particular place for various other reasons.

There are a few external and internal factors that influence where we work and how we work. We take up a specific field of interest, study, complete our degrees and get a job in the same field to work for. Here, we see that we work according to our interests and not some random jobs (in most cases). After we take up our job, the workload, the organisational culture and peer groups define our work and progress. These are a few external factors.

Every soul longs for a little recognition and appreciation. If the team leader or project manager keeps his employees motivated, they tend to work better. If the colleagues from office are encouraging, a person performs better. The benefits, holidays, office parties, bonuses also influence the employees inclination towards showing up at office and working towards the progress of his project successfully, indirectly profiting the company.

Some internal factors are interest in his field of work, satisfaction in finishing on or before deadlines, possessions he could buy from his/her salary, etc. All these factors ensure that a person is motivated at work and happy to do work. So, yes, Money does motivate us but it is not only money that motivates us.

title: Trump: The Machiavellian Prince
description:
What is Machiavellianism?

The word 'Machiavellianism' is derived from the name of an Italian writer, philosopher, and politician, Nicollo Machiavelli. The author of "The Prince". The book is based on leadership that is so pragmatic and emotionally distant. These leaders that the end justifies the means. Machiavellianism in psychology refers to a personality trait which sees a person so focused on their own interests they will manipulate, deceive, and exploit others to achieve their goals.

A few traits of a Machiavellian leader:

- The person is narcissistic. He/ she does not refuse photo-ops and handshakes.

-The person is very much involved with himself/herself. Thinks self-importance is a must.

- Very often, these kinds of people do not tell why they are doing something before they do it. Their reasons are very secretive and most probably, will beneficiate them more than the larger good.

- They are cunning and are good at manipulation. They know which keys to push. They often trade in words.

- Under no circumstance will they let go of their power even at the cost of not being loved, respected or hated.

Sound familiar?

Yes. Down to our topic! The President of the United States, Mr. Donald Trump seems to fit the personality traits of a Machiavellian. The 45th and current president of the US assumed office on 20th January 2017. By the end of the completion of one year as the president, he has brought about a million changes for the citizens, immigrants, and immigrants who live in the country. He has also amended various foreign policies and trade policies. Taken major decisions in terms of the military activities.

- Pulling out of the Paris Climat Accord

-Cancellation H-1B visas

-Building the Texas-Mexico border wall

-The US led air strikes in Syria

are all examples rather exhibitions of the above-mentioned traits in Donald Trump's desicions and behaviour. Would you agree or disagree on this comparison?
